home.slogan: IT expertise at the heart of your projects, creativity as signature
home.intro: AffinityWise accompanies you in your IT projects, development, digital marketing, video and design.

about.title: About us
about.presentation: AffinityWise is a company specialized in IT consulting, development, digital marketing, video and design.
about.visionText: Accompany our clients in their digital transformation with a human and innovative approach.
about.historyText: AffinityWise was founded to meet the growing needs of companies in technology, marketing and design.

services.title: Our Services
services.consultingDesc: Complete technical expertise to optimize your IT infrastructure, migrate to the cloud and secure your systems. Our team of experts accompanies you in all your technology projects.
services.devDesc: Custom development of web and mobile applications, APIs and integrations. We create innovative solutions adapted to your company's needs.
services.marketingDesc: Complete marketing strategies including SEO, social media management, advertising campaigns and analytics to maximize your digital presence.
services.mediaDesc: Creation of visual identities, professional video editing, motion design and corporate photography for impactful communication.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.intro: Discover some of our achievements in IT, design, video and marketing.
portfolio.project1Desc: Development of a cloud solution for EDF.
portfolio.project2Desc: Digital strategy and social media management for Orange.
